CourseName: Mechanics and Reliability of Semiconductor Packaging
Prerequisite: Recommended background: basic solid mechanics, materials science, and heat transfer. No prior fracture mechanics or finite element experience required; essential concepts (fracture, fatigue, viscoplasticity, thin film mechanics) will be introduced qualitatively before packaging-specific applications. No mandatory specialized software; demonstrations will use institute-licensed or free tools (e.g., COMSOL, ANSYS, spreadsheets).
